name: Permafrost Melting Tool
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ The parts for the tool can be acquired by doing the Xan Civilization Quest in Penumbra. #L "Incomplete Permafrost Melting Tool" "269804" #L "Permafrost Powered Tubes" "269810" #L "Permafrost Battery" "269809" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Incomplete Permafrost Melting Tool + Permafrost Powered Tubes = #L "Inactive Permafrost Melting Tool" "269803" Skills: | 1250 CL | Inactive Permafrost Melting Tool + Permafrost Battery = #L "Permafrost Melting Tool" "269805" Skills: | 1250 CL |
